comments.body: This requires dynamic lighting.
我想我们需要它，这真的很酷

Yeah, and I respect that, I really truly do. But it just needs to be renewable as well. Idk how but it needs to be renewable

I'm on a server full of players, so when a deep dark city is found, only a select few will be able to get swift sneak
Personally, I think they should just be a super rare drop from the Warden (Like 1/100). Which will give more players access to them and inspire the community to work on Warden farms

Honestly I wouldn't be opposed to making it a treasure enchantment that can be traded/fished for or even just a normal enchantment you can get on an enchantment table, right now it seems sort of silly to have a non-renewable enchant that would mainly be useful in the very place you have to venture to get it, in other words once you have swift sneak you don't need swift sneak as badly.

I think the idea of Wardens liking music is great! Maybe no dancing since the Warden is supposed to be an intimidating mob, but the concept of unique Warden-related mechanics for jukeboxes is pretty epic.
This wouldn't make sense, wardens only detect abrupt movement, not sound.
Danielorbos63639963

An alternative idea to this could be when it roars it pushes the player back and knocks them off their pillars or pushes them back if they are in a hole. The warden should also have a longer reach which is another alternative solution to this problem.
Yes so that people can’t just build up to kill it a much bigger challenge more fun
their is already a phantom? you know those bat zombie like things.
There's already a Phantom mob, it spawns when you don't sleep for 3 nights in a row.

An interesting idea for a boss monster. However, there is already a mob called the Phantom. Also, the diamond block drop feels a bit random, and frankly underwhelming, as by the time most players would get a rare enchantment like that they'll already have plenty of diamonds. Maybe have it drop a new item? Maybe something like "Ectoplasm", that could be used for a new type of potion or something?

I do like the idea of a boss that needs a special enchant to hit it, I just think it needs a little tinkering.
the phantoms already a mob heres some name suggestions maybe wraith or reaveanat
two phantoms are better than one
Fb
Yea
Swap the phantom and ghost words and it will make sense
Awesome! it could be 3-D map of empty blocks within a certain size of the map.

el warden sera inmune a la lava? por que asi nos colocamos en una gran altura, ponemos bloques en las orillas para que no nos tire con el rujido y ponemos lava y solo sea cuestion de tiempo para que el warden muera quemado por la lava y nosotros solo quedarnos mirando o en FK espero que sea inmune a la lava para que nos sea un desafio matarlo
Si eso eso aria que los jugadores demás robara lo intem y no matar a warden
It's not just meant to be a challenge to kill; it's meant to be avoided and almost impossible to kill. Killing it should at least not be a desirable or normally feesible goal.
Que puedas acariciar a tus mascotas
Yeeeeeeeesssss
Teleport ability please.

1. They said the Deep Dark is not intended to have any connection to the End. The color pallette is meant to be more blueish; a combination of death and souls you might say. The stuff that looks like Endstone is actually bone-like material. All of that was mentioned by Kingbdogz (other than the death and souls part; that's just (kind of obvious) speculation).

2. They said they want to add unique items that will actually add completely new gameplay mechanics and abilities that players were not able to do before, as opposed to just stronger gear.
Why it takes 3 MINUTES? Not even obsidian takes so long with a diamond pickaxe
why 3 minutes? there doesn't seem to be a block that can be destroyed that long? it's better if the Jaw sculk will be destroyed in 3 minutes if you use a wooden pickaxe hahaha that's clear!
how about 10 seconds?
Simply, cute
Or just make amethyst collars for dogs that make the dog glow in the dark, that could work too!

Hey your idea is awesome. And i will add to the golem two little wings in the back that can help him

to fly a little to place torches and lanterns in the roof of the dark places.
I don't know why this isn't a thing yet
It'd be nice to have something to do with all this copper...

good ideas
i hope that this gets added in to minecraft.
Great idea!
I think this is a great idea
I think this makes it more balanced but i dont think it makes as much sense.

Love it. It would allow the players to dictate how mobs should spawn. Players who want a challenge could make it so the light level is 13 for mobs to spawn, while veterans could keep it to how it is now (light level 7) some people who want a slight challenge could make it 3 and those who just want them in complete darkness 0. This gives map makers also huge possibilities!
People who really like building with glowstone can put it to 15
Badlands biomes have a lot of gold in their caves, I see no reason to implement gold ore veins.
Why not? Iron and Copper have them... and Gold Ore veins exist in real life, so I see no reason not to.
There is already enough gold in the caves of that biome, why add more? Also, copper and iron veins exist because there is no specific "biome" that gives you more iron or copper than another biome.
Calcite in real life is litteraly everywhere in the world why isn't it more common in minecraft?
The higher you go the more non stackable items it can hold (for gifts)
Actually, in Minecraft it's spelled "Sculk," not Skulk. Very minor difference, just thought I'd let you know. :)
oh i was very tired when i made this

Good idea! But I don't want it craftable, because that's too OP. Gold tools have the easiest enchantability, so if they had the same durability as diamond so easily, it'd be crazy, and people would rarely ever need diamonds and debris anymore.

This should work on any pickaxes, and also give them the mining speed, not just the durability of the tool it's replicating, as long as the mining speed is higher than the original pickaxe's speed.    It should be uncraftable.
okay but they still won't be able to mine gold ore
Nice game

Do you even know how Redstone works? Basically all solid blocks can be powered, that already happens. Unless you mean that Copper provides an output when it is not powered and doesn't provide an output when it is powered, like Redstone torches, but that is not unique functionality and would be less intuitive. Unless, once again, you mean that Redstone signals can travel through Copper blocks essestially like with Redstone dust, which perhaps enables vertical-travelling redstone, but I don't think it would be that logical of a feature. Perhaps you were even referring to using Copper ingots, not blocks? I have no way to know.
So... you're saying Copper Block should emit a redstone signal like a redstone block? I don't think that makes sense.
We have redstone blocks for this. Making copper a source of redstone will only interfere with redstone builds.
Personally, I want copper to be able to pass the Redstone signal, like Redstone powder.
I like the idea!
Yes please !!! it will be cool to have different kind of dragons
there should be water dragons that don't drown and are found in caged rooms in ocean monuments and in aquifers. skeleton horses please!
i meen dragons
That would be awesome maybe have like hostile mole spawners in the room protecting the chest
